title: Jaded: Full Circle
description: Two souls, born thousands of miles apart, but destined to be together from birth. She was born to a vampire and a human, with beauty and power that would remain unparalleled. He is the son of the only living phoenix in existence. Two very different people, one destiny. Only one thing stands between the two and their future. Stephan, the son of Lucifer, demented by his quest for revenge and crazed by the power he holds, will see them dead first. Jade and Michael will fight for each other, and they will fight for their families. Because destiny will always bring everything full circle.
author: Danielle James
